author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/sprint (compensated affiliate link) - The Intellivision Sprint looks like it might be 40 years old but it's actually a brand new recreation of the classic 80's game console from Mattel. It comes with 45 games but it can run other Intellivision games via USB. See more retro : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIswkmY7xCvaH3K_78rUsEIO and subscribe to my weekly email! http://lon.tv/email and the channel: http://lon.tv/s
